text.name: longdescription
text.text: Emulator for LD-V1000 Converged device and home video game console capable of playing Laserdiscs, Compact Discs, console games, and LD-G karaoke discs. The dev calls DAPHNE the "First Ever Multiple Arcade Laserdisc Emulator" ("FEMALE"). Derived from Princess Daphne, the heroine of Dragon's Lair. Release date '05.
